languages.text: "Я... лишь кукла в твоей игре. Все, что было на этом трибунале — сплошная ложь!"

traits.locale_text: "Я... лишь кукла в твоей игре. Все, что было на этом трибунале — сплошная ложь!"

languages.text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"
languages.original_text: "Я... лишь кукла в твоей игре. Все, что было на этом трибунале — сплошная ложь!"

traits.locale_text: "I... am but a puppet in your play. Everything that took place at this trial is a vicious lie!"
"I... am but a puppet in your play. Everything that took place at this trial is a vicious lie!"
"I... am but a puppet in your play. Everything that took place at this trial is a vicious lie!"
"I... am but a puppet in your play. Everything that took place at this trial is a vicious lie!"
"I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"
"I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

languages.text: « Je... ne suis qu'une marionnette dans votre mascarade. Ce procès tout entier est un mensonge éhonté ! »
languages.original_text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

traits.locale_text: « Je... ne suis qu'une marionnette dans votre comédie. Tout ce qui a été dit lors de ce procès est un mensonge éhonté ! »

languages.text: “我……我不过是这场闹剧里的木偶罢了。这场审判中发生的一切，都是恶毒的谎言！”
languages.original_text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

traits.locale_text: “我……我不过是这场戏里的木偶罢了。这场审判中发生的一切，都是恶毒的谎言！”

languages.text: 「私は…芝居の操り人形にすぎない。この裁判で起きたことはすべて悪質な嘘だ！」
languages.original_text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は…芝居の操り人形にすぎない。この裁判で起きたことはすべて悪質な嘘だ！」

languages.text: "Ich ... bin in dieser Scharade nur eine Marionette. Alles, was hier im Prozess geschehen ist, ist gemeine Lüge!"
languages.original_text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... bin bei Eurem Spiel nur eine Marionette. Alles, was hier im Prozess vorgetragen wurde, ist gemeine Lüge!"

languages.text: «No... soy nada más que un títere en una farsa. ¡Todo lo que ha sucedido en este juicio es una mentira abyecta!».
languages.original_text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

traits.locale_text: «Yo... no soy más que un títere en esta pantomima. ¡Todo lo que se ha dicho en esta farsa de juicio es una abyecta mentira!».

languages.text: "Beni tiyatronuzda kukla gibi oynatıyorsunuz. Bu mahkeme bariz yalanlar üzerine kurulu!"
languages.original_text: "I... am nothing but a puppet in this charade. Everything that has taken place at this trial is a vicious lie!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben bu maskaralıkta bir kuklayım yalnızca. Bu mahkemede gerçekleşen her şey haince bir yalan!"
